data.name: ForeVR Pool
data.description:
ForeVR Pool brings the coolest pool halls from around the globe straight to your living room! Challenge friends, family, and in-game pros to a game of 8-ball pool – no table required.

Battle 12 bots to level up and take on Legendary challengers. Join a Quick Match or jump into a private multiplayer party! Friend in town? Share your headset with Pass & Play. Up the ante and stake in-game coins in matches against other players.

Get ready to: AIM, LOCK, & SHOOT!

🎱 50 custom cues and 5 immersive halls
🎱 Optional aim assist target lines and match settings
🎱 1v1 Public & Private Multiplayer + Quick Match and Local Pass & Play
🎱 12 NPC pros to challenge!
🎱 YouTube-powered jukebox

Experience ForeVR’s custom Pool physics engine, tailored for all play styles—spins, jumps, and trick shots included. Game on!

❓Need support? help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎱 ForeVR Pool now supports Mixed Reality. To enable:
1. Select your hall
2. Open Settings (flat “hamburger”  button on the left controller)
3. Select "MR"
4. Enable!
🎱 MR supports both roomscale (physically moving around the table) and table rotation (using the joystick to rotate the table) for locomotion

IMPROVEMENTS
🎱 Fixed bugs

KNOWN ISSUES
🎱 Interacting with the table while balls are moving after a shot can cause a delay between turns
🎱 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

🎱 Practice mode. Adjust your angles and shots and practice clearing the table, no opponent needed.
🎱 Height Adjustment. In settings, you can adjust the height of your in-game view if you’d like to see the table from a higher or lower angle.
🎱 Free Table Movement. Freely around the table without the need to snap to the rail around the table and strafe and lets players locomote ‘normally’ around the hall.

IMPROVEMENTS

Welcome to ForeVR Pool! 🎱
 
The ForeVR Games team is thrilled for you to play our most player-requested game yet.
 
Check out all our favorite features:
🎱 Challenge 12 NPC pros in single-player, ranging from amateur to legendary
🎱 Play 1v1 in Private and Public Multiplayer, Quick Match, or Pass and Play. Up the ante by staking coins! 
🎱 Unlock 50 unique cues to add to your arsenal
🎱 Experience 5 halls—Brooklyn, Chicago, Seattle, Dallas, and Paris!
🎱 Optional aim assist lines, one or two-handed shooting, and match settings (pocket calls, shot clock)
🎱 YouTube-powered jukebox 
 
Please consider leaving us a review—we appreciate your feedback, and it helps us make the game better!
 
❓ Need help, or have a bug to report? Contact our support team at help.forevrgames.com!
